person.name: Paul K. Sybrowsky
person.description: Elder Paul K. Sybrowsky was called to serve as a member of the Second Quorum of the Seventy of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints on April 2, 2005, at age 60. He served first as a counselor and then as President of the Australia Area Presidency. He is currently serving as an Assistant Executive Director in the Church History Department.
